Title: Relates to permitting Mercy Haven, Inc. to file an application for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Allows Mercy Haven, Inc. to file an application with the town of Islip for a real property tax exemption for the 2017-2018, 2018-2019, and 2019-2020 assessment rolls for certain parcels located in Central Islip.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting Mercy Haven, Inc. to file an application for a real property tax exemption
